title: I can troll and never be permabanned.
body: And its the truth. no I didnt get trolls on my team and flamed them and got banned. Because I know how this game works. I could care less that the people who were toxic didnt get banned. but all you need to realize one fact. I can troll and never get permabanned and or banned. and there is no arguement that exists that can counter that statment. because its 100  % true. if you have a counter arguement pls post it in the comments below. good day.

If you want people to take yourself seriously the put your hypothesis to the test, record it with you saying out loud what you are doing when to troll, and then post it here. A few games a day for around 6 months would probably prove your point.
